A resolution commemorating the Day of Portugal, CamÃµes, and the Portuguese Communities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and commemorates the Day of Portugal, Camões, a holiday celebrating Portuguese heritage and culture named for the 16th century poet Luís Vaz de Camões. The resolution also honors the contributions of Portuguese Americans to society.
